subject: FW: FW: ime stuff
body:
yo

got this from client forwarding to u

---forwarded msg---
hey julie can u set up that dr appt thing for me?? 
name: Rodriguez, Patricia (patty)
file#: idk maybe 2025-something? or PD-something check with office
dr type: ortho i think? back problems
when: doesnt matter just not mondays i got physical therapy
location: anywhere in san diego county is fine
deadline: boss wants it soon like maybe 3 weeks?

attaching pics of my medical stuff sorry for bad quality took pics with phone

thnx
---end forward---

plz handle thx
J

attachments.text_content: Photo of medical document - partially visible text: Patient Patricia Rodriguez, female, age 38. Complaint: chronic lower back pain for 6 months. X-ray shows degenerative disc disease L3-L4. Prescribed muscle relaxants and physical therapy. Patient works as warehouse supervisor, reports pain worsens with lifting and bending.

Photo of prescription - hard to read, appears to be: Cyclobenzaprine 10mg, take as needed for muscle spasm. Ibuprofen 800mg three times daily with food. Follow up in 4 weeks if no improvement. Dr. signature illegible. Date: February 2025.
